backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the BEAST RIDE backend, defining data types and CRUD operations for products, categories, collections, orders, and user profiles, with role-based access control via MixinAuthorization and blob storage via MixinStorage.
backend/migration.mo: Trivial migration module that accepts an empty old state and returns an empty new state, serving as a no-op schema migration placeholder.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the 'Claim Admin Access' first-load flow on the Admin page to its implementation file and associated components/test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated JSON summaries of all frontend source files, describing each component, hook, page, and style file in the BEAST RIDE frontend.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH CSS custom property tokens for light and dark themes, covering background, foreground, primary, sidebar, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the BEAST RIDE React SPA, mounting the app into a root div and loading the Vite entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with routes for Home, Shop, ProductDetail, Admin, and OrderConfirmation, all wrapped in CartProvider and a shared Layout.
frontend/src/components/admin/Categories: Admin panel section for managing categories and collections, including CRUD operations and product assignment to collections via forms and dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/GoogleLogi: Displays a styled admin login screen with a Google sign-in button using Internet Identity, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrdersSect: Admin orders table that lists all orders with customer details, address, items, payment method, and allows updating order status via a dropdown.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductFor: Modal form for adding or editing a product, with fields for name, price, description, category, image, and inventory, using add/update mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductsSe: Admin products table displaying all products with image, name, category, price, and inventory, supporting add, edit, and delete actions.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Pass-through wrapper component that previously guarded admin routes but now delegates all authentication and authorization to the Admin page itself.
frontend/src/components/AdminSidebar.tsx: Sticky dark sidebar for the admin dashboard with navigation items (Orders, Products, Categories), active-state highlighting, principal display, and a logout button.
Wrapper div that applies a fade-in-up CSS animation when the element enters the viewport, using the useIntersectionObserver hook with optional delay support.
frontend/src/components/CartDrawer.tsx: Slide-in cart drawer with multi-step checkout flow covering cart review, shipping form with validation, payment method selection, and order submission via the useCreateOrder mutation.
frontend/src/components/CategorySplit.ts: Renders a two-panel split section for 'Bike Accessories' and 'Car Performance' categories, each with a background image, gradient overlay, animated border, and a click handler that navigates to the filtered shop page.
frontend/src/components/CheckoutStepIndi: Displays a two-step checkout progress indicator (Shipping and Payment) with visual states for active, completed, and inactive steps using icons and colored styling.
frontend/src/components/CinematicParalla: A parallax-style full-width section with a night-road background image and a large animated headline 'DOMINATE THE ROAD' that triggers a CSS animation when scrolled into view.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedProducts: A horizontally scrollable product carousel fetching all products via a query hook, supporting touch swipe and button navigation with scale/opacity effects for adjacent cards.
frontend/src/components/FilterSidebar.ts: A sidebar component that renders a category filter list (All, Bike Accessories, Car Performance) with active state highlighting and an onChange callback.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer with the brand logo, three-column layout for Shop links, Support items, and social media icon buttons, plus a copyright line.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Fixed top navigation header that transitions styling on scroll, includes desktop nav links, a cart icon with item count badge, and a hamburger menu that opens a MobileNav drawer.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Full-viewport hero section with a background image, gradient overlays, a pulsing red glow, headline text, and a CTA button that navigates to the shop page.
frontend/src/components/InstagramCommuni: Displays a community section with a 2x4 grid of Instagram-style community images, each with an Instagram icon overlay on hover, wrapped in animated entrance sections.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout wrapper that composes Header, Footer, CartDrawer, and a Toaster notification component around page children with a dark background.
frontend/src/components/MobileNav.tsx: Slide-in mobile navigation drawer with an overlay, site logo, close button, and links to main shop categories.
frontend/src/components/PaymentMethodSel: Radio-style selector component for choosing between COD, UPI, and Card payment methods with styled active/inactive states.
frontend/src/components/PerformanceHighl: Marketing section displaying three animated feature cards (Speed, Durability, Rider Approved) with custom SVG icons under a 'Built Different' heading.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Card component displaying a product image, category, name, price, and an add-to-cart button; clicking the card navigates to the product detail page.
frontend/src/components/ProductTabs.tsx: Tabbed UI for a product detail page showing Description, Specifications, and Shipping info with an animated active-tab indicator.
Horizontally scrollable row of ProductCards filtered by the current product's category, falling back to other products if none match.
frontend/src/components/Reviews.tsx: Static testimonials section rendering a grid of four customer review cards with star ratings, review text, and product attribution.
frontend/src/context/CartContext.tsx: React context providing cart state and actions (add, remove, update quantity, clear, open/close) with computed subtotal, item count, and free shipping progress.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches a backend actor using React Query, supporting both anonymous and authenticated (Internet Identity) usage, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider context and useInternetIdentity hook for managing ICP Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useIntersectionObserv: Custom hook that uses IntersectionObserver to track whether a referenced DOM element is in the viewport, with support for threshold, rootMargin, and triggerOnce options.
frontend/src/hooks/useMutations.ts: Defines React Query mutation hooks for backend write operations including admin access claiming, order status updates, and CRUD operations for products and categories.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching backend data including products, categories, collections, orders, and admin status checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollPosition.ts: Custom hook that tracks the window's vertical scroll position using a requestAnimationFrame-throttled scroll event listener.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Barlow fonts, configures Tailwind, defines CSS custom properties for the dark 'Beast Ride' theme, and declares reusable component styles like beast-btn and metal-text.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/Admin.tsx: Admin dashboard page that handles Internet Identity authentication, admin status verification, and renders section-based admin UI (orders, products, categories) with a sidebar. Also supports bootstrapping the first admin via a claim-access flow.
frontend/src/pages/Collection.tsx: Product collection/shop page that displays all products in a filterable grid, supporting category filtering via URL search params and a sidebar component.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Home page that composes multiple section components (hero, category split, featured carousel, performance highlight, parallax, reviews, Instagram community) into a single landing page.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmation.tsx: Order confirmation page that reads order data from sessionStorage and displays a summary of the confirmed order including items, shipping address, payment method, and totals.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetail.tsx: Product detail page that fetches and displays a single product by ID with image, description, quantity selector, add-to-cart functionality, tabs, and related products.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module providing helper functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the Beast Ride Admin frontend, extending the default theme with custom brand colors (beast tokens), fonts (Barlow), shadows, keyframe animations, and enabling typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the current project state (version 3) for the Beast Ride Admin Web3/ICP app, recording existing features, known issues around persisted admin principal IDs, and pending action requests to reset/clear the admin slot on fresh deployments.
